thread.title: New York City High Rise Offers Dorm-Style Living for Adults

author: Josh Barbanel
title: New York City High Rise Offers Dorm-Style Living for Adults
text:
On the outside, the ALTA LIC, a new 43-story rental high-rise in Long Island City, is similar to the other glassy towers with extravagant amenities that have sprung up near the approaches to the Ed Koch Queensboro Bridge to Manhattan.
But inside, folding bed by folding bed, it is challenging the conventional model followed by New York Cityâ€™s housing developers for generations.
ALTA...
